game.characters

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.characters.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Printable, Skilled, java.lang.Comparable<Actor>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoctorMaybe, Goon, Grunt, Ninja, OxygenDispenser, Player, Q, Rocket, YugoMaxx

    public class Character
extends Actor
    Character extends actors to implement functionality specific to our game.

        private java.util.Optional<Action> executeStatusEffects(Display display)

        Returns:
        Optional action.
